title: What is the law in New Hanover County regarding the proper way to dispose of abandoned property, following an unsuccessful attempt to notify the owner by certified letter?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/03/what-is-the-law-in-new-hanover-county-regarding-the-proper-way-to-dispose-of-abandoned-property/
